channel.title: Tips on Arthuring's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on Arthuring's Blog

item.title: BUAA-OO-Unit1-ExpressionExtent
item.description:
第一单元作业总结–表达式展开 一、总体情况 三次作业总共的BNF描述如下 $$  egin{aligned} Expr &ightarrow [+|-]Term|Expr[+|-]Term
ewline Term &ightarrow [+|-]Factor|Term*Factor
ewline Factor &ightarrow ConstFactor|ExprFactor|VarFactor
ewline ConstFactor &ightarrow SignedInteger
ewline ExprFactor &ightarrow (Expr)[exp]
ewline VarFactor &ightarrow PowerFactor|TriFactor|SumFactor|FuncCall
ewline TriFactor &ightarrow sin(Factor)[exp]|cos(Factor)[exp]
ewline exp &ightarrow ** [+] SignedInteger
ewline SignedInteger &ightarrow
